remarks: Move class substitution in and out of the image of a function. (Contributed by FL, 15-Dec-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2016.)  Obsolete as of 20-Aug-2018.  Use ~ csbfv12 instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: csbima12gOLD $p |- ( A e. C -> [_ A / x ]_ ( F " B ) = ( [_ A / x ]_ F " [_ A / x ]_ B ) ) $.
